channel.title: [317][Delta source]Where is int CombatExpRate defined?
channel.description:
Okay, so I was trying to find out how to raise the xp rates for skills on my server (Soul Pkerz), and I figured out how to raise the xp rates for all skills. However, I cannot find where the integer CombatExpRate is defined, so I cannot fix it.
Thank you for your help.
d.v.c
